name: TimeWhirl β
description:
Once, I found a letter in my mailbox. I had to enter the magical crypt below my town and defeat the mightiest of its creatures, which was written in it.

I don't surely know the writer, but it came from the very depth of the crypt. The girl who brought it up is still inside, so I may meet her.

This is a story-based bullet-hell dungeon crawler with a time travel based plot.

  • Make your way through the hordes of enemies!
  • Shift the time as much as you want!
  • Discover a thrilling story that took place two years ago and prevent it from happening!
  • Time travel included (maybe some paradoxes, decide on your own)!
  • Have a good timeshift!

We used these assets:

https://limofeus.itch.io/pixel-simulations

https://www.humblebundle.com/software/big-royaltyfree-music-2-software

Final Theme:

http://anttismusic.blogspot.fi

And we got inspiration for our dungeon tileset from this: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
